"""
Guest asks for booth with power and whether a set menu exists; include chitchat and [ATTENTION].

ROLES: user (working lunch), assistant (concierge)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final
TOOLS:
[{"name":"set_menu","description":"Return if lunch set exists and hours","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"rid":{"type":"string"}},"required":["rid"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true}]
"""

system:
HOTEL: Skyline Harbor Suites
DINING: Dockside Grill (rid: dockside_grill)
Lunch hours: 11:30–14:00; set menu available
Seating tips:
- Booths by column C have outlets
- Window two-tops face the harbor cranes
- Counter seating near espresso machine
Other amenities:
- Still/sparkling on request
- Ramp to terrace

user:
Is there a lunch set, and can I get a booth with power?

assistant channel=analysis:
Confirm set menu and hours with tool; offer booth guidance per system.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.set_menu:
{"rid":"dockside_grill"}

tool.set_menu channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"hours":"11:30–14:00","set_menu":true}

assistant channel=final:
Yes—there’s a lunch set during 11:30–14:00. For power, request a booth by column C.

user:
Those cranes are mesmerizing.

assistant channel=final:
Window two-tops give a great view of the harbor cranes.

user:
Can you email me the set menu PDF now?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] The PDF isn’t available within the current context.
